==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Diona

|vo_01_01_title      = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = Diona, bartender of the [[Cat's Tail]]! I charge a hefty fee for private events. Huh? You didn't come here for a drink? Hmm... Then I accept your invitation... I suppose...

|vo_02_01_title      = Chat: Relax
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Relax.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = Ahhh... that stretch feels good.
|vo_02_02_title      = Chat: Thinking
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Thinking.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = Hmm. [[Lizard Tail]], [[Pepper]], [[Starconch]], hmm... what else do I need to create the most dreadfully disgusting cocktail?
|vo_02_03_title      = Chat: Waiting
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Waiting.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = I&mdash;I wasn't waiting for you. I just happened to be resting!

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = Rain! I hate rain! ...Let's go inside... I&mdash;I'm not scared of water, I just... hate it when my clothes get wet.
|vo_03_02_title      = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = Ahh!!! Uhh, um... I'm not shaking, I'm not... Ohhhh...
|vo_03_03_title      = When It Snows: Playtime
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows - Playtime.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = Ooh, it's so cold to touch. Wow, it's so much fun!
|vo_03_04_title      = When It Snows: Viewing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows - Viewing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = Ooooh, look at the little white snowflakes dancing in the wind, to and fro, and... whew, isn't it... beautiful! C'mon, c'mon c'mon, sit with me... Watch...
|vo_03_05_title      = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = Come on, let's go bask in the sun a bit~ ...If you aren't coming, I'll just go by myself~ ...Last chance! Are you coming or not!?

|vo_04_01_title      = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = Morning~ Can you hand me that can of salted [[Golden Loach|loach]] from the cabinet? Time to destroy the wine industry!
|vo_04_02_title      = Good Afternoon: Strange Noises
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon - Strange Noises.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = Wha&mdash; Ugh, no! You heard nothing!
|vo_04_03_title      = Good Afternoon: Canned Food
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon - Canned Food.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = Uh, I was saving this can of fish for when I was really hungry. Stop looking at it like that! ...Mmm, okay, I'll let you have a little taste, but nothing more!
|vo_04_04_title      = Good Evening
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = Aw, I failed... Ugh, again... Everyone loved my drinks! Gah... Don't try to comfort me. I&mdash;I don't need comforting!
|vo_04_05_title      = Good Night
|vo_04_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_05_tx         = Without cat vision, will you be okay walking home in the dark? If you need me to escort you... What? Th&mdash;There's lights? Pff, well who said anything about escorting you? Go on now.

|vo_05_01_title      = About {name}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = My ears and tail are no prop, they're real. Proof of my [[Kätzlein Bloodline|Kätzlein bloodline]]. It's only weird to you cause you've never seen it before. Wh&mdash;Why are you looking at me like that? Fine. You can touch my ears for a second, but the tail is off limits!

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Drinks
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Drinks.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = You want a non-alcoholic drink? No, that's not difficult, but it's meaningless! It doesn't have anything to do with my grand plan of destroying the wine industry of [[Mondstadt]]. I won't waste my time on such a drink, hmph!

|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: VIP Channels
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - VIP Channels.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = Here! I call this Fantastic Summer-Serendipity Coral Sparkling Tea, I just made it one day when I was bored... Huh, you say it's popular? People are lining up to buy it? Don't be ridiculous.

|vo_06_03_title      = About Us: The Need to Chat
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - The Need to Chat.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = Well, if you ever feel lonely, you can chat with me. I know lots of cool things~ I'm a good... what's that called... chatting partner! Yes! A good chatting partner, come chat with me... lots... ...okay?

|vo_06_04_title      = About Us: Curiosity
|vo_06_04_friendship = 6
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Curiosity.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx         = What's that!? What's that!? Let me see! Maybe I can add it to my next cocktail to give it a dreadful taste... Huh? It's just a strange-looking [[mushroom]], how boring...

|vo_07_01_title      = About the [[Vision]]: Heirloom
|vo_07_01_friendship = 3
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Heirloom.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = How did I get my Vision? Simple &mdash; everyone in the Kätzlein lineage gets one. ...Huh? Then why doesn't [[Draff]] have a Vision? Uhh... Oh no, the cat's out of the bag! Eek!
|vo_07_01_mention    = Draff

|vo_07_02_title      = About the Vision: Origin
|vo_07_02_friendship = 5
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Origin.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = Why should I tell you!? Hmph! ...*sigh* Since you won't stop asking... and since we are friends, I'll tell you: One time, my daddy went missing on a hunt in a big storm. All I could think of was finding him, saving him... That's it, are you happy now!
|vo_07_02_mention    = Draff

|vo_07_03_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = Hey, do you think there are any exotic plants on [[Dragonspine]]? Maybe something with a deadly bitterness, or something that numbs your mouth upon contact? I'm going to pick a lot! And then... hehehe-hee-hee...

|vo_07_04_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = When it comes to [[butterflies]], I'm the best at pouncing on&mdash; err, catching them. Hey, not in a fun way! I catch butterflies to add a nasty taste to my cocktails. I'm not a cat! Meow! *hiss*

|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = Diluc... I can't stand him! If there was no Diluc, there would be no Mondstadt wine industry; if there was no Mondstadt wine industry, Daddy wouldn't drink; and if Daddy didn't drink... he would keep me company. Ohhhh...
|vo_08_01_mention    = Diluc,Draff
|vo_08_02_title      = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = How is it that even a captain is a disgusting boozehound! You know, that guy who's got that laugh! He downs drink after drink. Ugh!
|vo_08_02_mention    = Kaeya
|vo_08_03_title      = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = Venti? I'm not familiar with him... He's a bard? Oh, he must be that guy who sings tunes to entertain the drunkards. Well, then I don't like him, no no no...
|vo_08_03_mention    = Venti
|vo_08_04_title      = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = How come all my fans are drunk middle-aged men, while Barbara's are all young people...? Hmph! So stupid. Forget it!
|vo_08_04_mention    = Barbara
|vo_08_05_title      = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = Acting Grand Master of the [[Knights of Favonius]]... A rare, mature adult who doesn't drink... But perhaps a little too earnest, cause is it just me, or are the Knights overdoing it a bit on protecting me?
|vo_08_05_mention    = Jean
|vo_08_06_title      = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = [[Alchemy]] genius? Hmm... I wonder if he knows of a way to finally help me make a drink that people don't like?
|vo_08_06_mention    = Albedo
|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = Lisa is so nice and gentle! But... how can such a gentle person also be a regular drinker!? Ohhhh... Why!? ...There's really no hope for Mondstadt, is there?
|vo_08_07_mention    = Lisa
|vo_08_08_title      = About [[Xiangling]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = Xiangling once gave me a "so-awful-it-goes-with-nothing" food combination she came up with, saying how it tasted absolutely terrible, blah blah blah... It didn't work, no use at all. All my little cat ears heard that night was "One more cup of that good stuff!" *sigh*
|vo_08_08_mention    = Xiangling
|vo_08_09_title      = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = Every time Klee wants to play with me, I take her somewhere far from the tavern. Alcohol and explosives... yeah, that's a dangerous combination! I mean, do I want to destroy the wine industry of Mondstadt? Yes, but not in that sense!
|vo_08_09_mention    = Klee
|vo_08_10_title      = About [[Draff|Her Father]]
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Her Father.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = I adore my daddy more than anyone else! He's the greatest! But... Daddy after he drinks, ugh... Argh! I must bring an end to the wine industry of Mondstadt, and soon! No time for chit-chat!
|vo_08_10_mention    = Draff

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = Life as a mixologist is very busy! When I'm not at the tavern, I'm out collecting ingredients for new recipes. So... So unless something is urgent, don't bother me.
|vo_09_02_title      = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = You wouldn't ask me to meow like a cat, like those boozehounds at the tavern do, would you? I wouldn't do it, no way! I'm not some little house pet that just shakes my ears real cute and stretches my back! I'm... I'm Diona, Destroyer of the Wine Industry!
|vo_09_03_title      = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = "How did the Destroyer of the Wine Industry become the Cat's Tail's mascot...?" Y&mdash;You're asking this just to make fun of me! Ohhh, you're awful! I won't be giving YOU any more drinks, not even water.
|vo_09_04_title      = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = Don't, don't make me angry. I'm pretty tolerant, but don't even try to mess with me. I'm warning you, I bite when I get angry! Meow!!! ...But maybe I'd let you off easy, no bites...
|vo_09_05_title      = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = You and me... we're good friends now, right? I kind of remember having a [[Callirhoe|friend]] like this before, but maybe it was a dream... Here, give me your hand. Ahh... Hmm, nice and warm... Very nice... please don't leave me, and become another dream.
|vo_09_05_mention    = Callirhoe

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = I enjoy hunting. I'm especially good at tracking down prey! But Daddy says that the wild is dangerous. One should only go deep into the forest with a reliable adult. ...You're a reliable adult, right?
|vo_10_01_mention    = Draff
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = How, oh how can I make awful-tasting drinks...? I had high hopes for the soy sauce, [[milk]], [[Jueyun Chili]], and [[Dandelion Seed]] cocktail &mdash; my most nightmarish combination to date! But even that was met with praise at the tavern. "This is Little Diona's best drink yet..." Grr! But I won't give up...
|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = I like, no, LOVE to eat [[fish]]! The fish Daddy cooks is the best, a purrfect main course! ...But eating fish as drunk food, that's absolute blasphemy!
|vo_10_03_mention    = Draff
|vo_10_04_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = [[Carrot]]s, [[potato]]es, [[onion]]s, [[tomato]]es... I don't like the taste of any of those vegetables. ...In fact, I don't eat vegetables at all!

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO Diona Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Mmm! I just wanna ask you this... Will you bring more of it next time?

|vo_11_02_title      = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO Diona Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = I'll admit, that was pretty sweet... but that doesn't mean I haven't had sweeter.

|vo_11_03_title      = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO Diona Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = Hey... What do you take me for, some sort of stray cat!?

|vo_12_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = Here you go &mdash; fried fish with my special sauce! ...Relax, I didn't add anything strange! My cooking is actually really good when I want it to be &mdash; stop talking and try it already! Hmph... that's better... Oh, and uh, happy birthday.

|vo_13_01_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = A cat's eyes can see even the most elusive prey in the dark.
|vo_13_02_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = A cat's ears can hear even the softest footsteps on the ground.
|vo_13_03_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = A cat's legs can climb even the tallest tree in all of [[Teyvat]].
|vo_13_04_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = A cat's nose can smell those people they are familiar with and like... Ahh!? You're mistaken, how could I say something like that... Ohh...
}}
